info.name: Campus Admin API
info.description:
This is a Postman Collection for the ***Campus Admin API*** endpoints. 

Refer to the main [Campus Admin API documentation](<link>) for more details.

If you have an API-related question, you can also discuss in the developer [community forum](<link>).



## Installation ##

### Quick install

Go to the [Collection](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/9042599/TWDfDtEK) and click `Run in Postman`.

### Manual install

You can also download this Collection from a GitHub repo here: [github_link](<link>)


## Environment

This Collection includes a pre-configured Environment. You will need to set up the following variables in order to run each request. Otherwise you have to manually put your baseurl and token for every request  :

|Name|Description|
|---|---|
|`baseurl`|Your Base URL|
|`token`|Your access token|

item.name: Login

request.description:
**You need to Log in as Admin to get access token**

**URL** : `/api/token/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Data Payload** :

```json
{
"username"	: "admin",
"password" : "a123a123",
"otp": "123456"
}
```

item.description:
This endpoint return details login information as an Admin, where you need the ***access token*** to use it as ***bearer token***.

For full details, see the [API reference](<link>) for these endpoints.

item.name: Password Change

request.description:

**URL** : `/password/change/`

**Method** : `POST`

```json
}
```

request.description:
**Delete-profile**

Delete only the personally identifiable information of a profile/student, her profile links and other personal information.

**URL** : /delete-profile/

**Method** : DELETE

**Request Body (for single profile)** :

```
{"ids":"b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb887f493ede"}
```

**Request Body (for multiple profile batch delete)** :

```
{"ids":"b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb887f493ede, b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb877f493ecc"}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url":"http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/delete-profile/",
  "date_time":"2021-01-18T09:11:50.349741Z",
  "data":{"message":"Students deleted successfully"}
}
```

```json
}
```

request.description:
View certificate details list **URL** : `/certificates//` **Method** : `GET` **Response** : ``` { "url": "https://api.admin.dev.campus.com/certificates/289200ae-e7cf-4dd9-813f-91caaa70516b/", "date_time": "2021-04-20T04:07:49.670454Z", "data": { "id": "289200ae-e7cf-4dd9-813f-91caaa70516b", "provider": { "id": "3c7f0d0c-62b3-4db2-a23a-d36ec70a6377", "name": "Mind Edge" }, "_is_deleted": false, "deleted": false, "created_at": "2020-04-22T08:58:25.158000Z", "updated_at": "2021-04-08T07:23:14.167000Z", "deleted_at": "2021-03-10T04:48:05.347000Z", "published_at": null, "version": 1, "from_importer": true, "external_id": "7731", "external_url": "https://catalog.mindedge.com/jenzabar/suites/7731/certificate-in-cybersecurity", "external_version_id": "0", "code": "7731", "title": "Certificate in Cybersecurity", "slug": "certificate-in-cybersecurity", "description": "

Certificate Description

\r\n\r\n

Cybersecurity, also known as Information Security, is the protection of data and personally identifiable information from malicious attacks, theft, and destruction. Failures of cybersecurity policies, both in large corporations and governmental agencies, have earned significant visibility and negative publicity in recent months and years. As the amount of data being stored continues to increase, and as hackers become more sophisticated, the need for cybersecurity is greater than ever.

\r\n\r\n

This Certificate in Cybersecurity offers lessons on the critical elements of information security, as well as foundational information about key certifications for professionals in the industry. Each of the eight courses in this suite will help learners master the vocabulary of the industry and offers examples, videos, interactive games, and review questions to ensure mastery of the material.

\r\n\r\n

Courses can be taken in any order. Upon successful completion, you can download and print a Certificate of Completion.

\r\n\r\n
\r\n\r\n\r\n

Key Features

\r\n\r\n
    \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Expert-supported\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Mobile-friendly\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Accessible\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Badge and credit-awarding\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Games & Flashcards\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Video content\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Real-world case studies\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Audio-enabled in app\r\n
    • \r\n
\r\n\r\n\r\n
\r\n\r\n

Refund Policy

\r\n\r\n

You may request a refund up to 5 days from the purchase date. The registration fee will only be refunded if less than 10% of each course in the certificate has been completed. Completion percentage can be viewed on the Course Progress page from within the course.

\r\n\r\n\r\n
\r\n\r\n

Notes

\r\n\r\n

All courses in this certificate have an \"Ask the Expert\" feature, which submits your questions directly to an expert in the field you are studying. Questions are answered as quickly as possible and usually within 24 hours.

\r\n\r\n

This course does not require any additional purchases of supplementary materials.

\r\n\r\n

Learners must achieve an average test score of at least 70% to meet the minimum successful completion requirement and qualify to receive IACET CEUs. Learners will have three attempts at all graded assessments.

\r\n\r\n", "_is_published": true, "learning_outcome": null, "image": {}, "default_image": { "original": "https://cdn-d.mindedgeonline.com/suite_icons/7731/Certificate-in-Cybersecurity-HRC.jpg" }, "summary": null, "syllabus_url": null, "level": null, "inquiry_url": null, "overrides": {}, "sections": [], "programs": [], "courses": [ "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc90", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc89", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc9b", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc9d", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc95", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc9c", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc9e", "5eb85eabdb51f985c733dc9f" ], "required_courses": [], "recommended_courses": [], "subjects": [], "keywords": [], "careers": [ "5e70b70787f7b325df9d20dc", "5e70b0db87f7b325df997046" ], "skills": [ "5e70ad9a87f7b325df977127", "5e70ad9b87f7b325df9771ae", "5e70ad9b87f7b325df9771cc", "5e70ad9b87f7b325df9771c7", "5e70ad9b87f7b325df977262", "5e70ad9c87f7b325df977276", "5e70ad9c87f7b325df97727b", "5e70ad9c87f7b325df977285", "5e70ada287f7b325df977635", "5e70addf87f7b325df979ca2", "5e70ae7287f7b325df97f91b", "5e70ae7287f7b325df97f94b", "5e70af9587f7b325df98ad8d", "5e70addf87f7b325df979ccd", "5e70b0de87f7b325df9971c1", "5e70aefb87f7b325df984edb" ], "_cls": "Certificate", "created_by": null, "updated_by": null, "deleted_by": null, "published_by": null, "price": { "amount": 499.0, "currency": "USD" }, "certificate_image_uri": "https://cdn-d.mindedgeonline.com/suite_icons/7731/Certificate-in-Cybersecurity-HRC.jpg", "content_ready": false } } ```

Size should not exceed 4MB]" } ``` **Response** : **Content example** : ```json { "url": "http://api.account.dev.campus.com/admin/course-providers/", "date_time": "2020-10-29T07:25:05.517189Z", "data": { "id": "5e6f6dc42326a0c5b7d3f337", "_is_deleted": false, "deleted": false, "is_active": true, "created_at": "2020-03-16T12:15:00.747000Z", "updated_at": "2020-04-17T14:59:02.939000Z", "address": "79 Essex Street", "city": "New tt York ss test", "state": 36, "zipcode": 10002, "geo_location": { "type": "Point", "coordinates": [ 40.718032, -73.988676 ] }, "name": "International of Photography test", "code": "ICP", "logo": { "original": "uploads/48b6c9db-56d2-4fa0-8138-ac4ade0c5b53.png" }, "summary": "The International Center of Photography (ICP) is the world’s leading institution dedicated to photography and visual culture.", "description": "

}
